SEARCH
Package wsp

Class User

java.lang.Object
wsp.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Employee, Student
public abstract class User extends Object implements Serializable
The User class is an abstract class representing a generic user in the system. It provides common functionality for all roles in system, such as viewing top researchers, news, notifications, and journals. It also handles comments on news and defines an abstract method for viewing the user-specific menu and changing user information.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName)
      Constructs a new `User` with the specified username, password, first name, and last name. Auto increment id of new user to ensure users have unique ids.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.

  • Method Details

    • getNotifications

      public Vector<String> getNotifications()
      Retrieves the vector containing notifications for the user.
      Returns:
      The vector of notifications for the user.

    • getJournals

      public Vector<ResearchJournal> getJournals()
      Retrieves the vector containing journals subscribed by the user.
      Returns:
      The vector of journals subscribed by the user.

    • viewTopResearcher

      public void viewTopResearcher()
      Displays the top cited researcher among all researchers along with their total citations.

      public void changeLanguage()

      public void addNotification(String mes)
      Adds a new notifications to the user's notifications vector.
      Parameters:
      message - The notification to be added.

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent(ResearchPaper paper, ResearchJournal rj)
      Handles an event related to a new research paper in subscribed research journal, adding a notification to the user's messages vector.
      Parameters:
      paper - The research paper related to the event.
      rj - The research journal related to the event.

    • getId

      public int getId()

    • authentification

      public void authentification()
      Authenticates the user by displaying information about top researchers, news, notifications, and the user-specific menu. This method serves as an entry point for users to interact with the system after successful login.

    • viewNews

      public void viewNews()
      Displays news available in the system.

    • viewOneNews

      public void viewOneNews()
      Displays detailed information about a selected news item, including comments. Provides the option to add a comment.

    • viewComments

      public void viewComments(News n)
      Displays comments for a specific news article.
      Parameters:
      n - The news article for which to display comments.

    • viewJournals

      public void viewJournals()
      Displays the list of journals subscribed by the user.

      Parameters:
